Posts.Content: May 6, 2014 03:11AM DLB122 wrote: I had my double mastectomies in 2005 and I thought the same as you are now.  Y only advise looking back on my decision is  really consider the reconstruction now versus maybe later when the affect of having no breasts hits you. And it will. I had a really hard time for a while and recently while wearing the external prosthetics which tend to move around and clothes just aren't made for them!!  I just wish I would have done reconstruction.
Posts.Title: 34 years old and do NOT want reconstruction. Cammychris matsgirlie
